website_summaries.verdict: A great deal for the quality, if you are looking for king-size shams. Other sizes are sold separately, though.
pros: Thick, well-made shams with no loose threads
Looks like something much more expensive
Price is for a set of shams
Hook-and-Loop closure, so no broken zippers
Comes in a variety of colors

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these!
customer_reviews.text: I’d give these 10 stars! I bought shims that were $50 bucks each and bed bath and beyond and I walked out thinking I can’t believe I spent 100 bucks on 2 decorative pillow shams! So I got on amazon looking for something cheaper. Found these and bought them and returned the other ones. Ya maybe they are quite as great as bed bath and beyond. But for a decorative piece on a bed these are great! And it comes with two for this price! It’s so great! In my photos they are the middle white pillows (between the red and the tan pillow shams)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, feel nice! Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these in white to use in a condo rental. I couldn't be more pleased. They are well made, have stood up to use by many renters and still look like new. They have a very nice feel, look expensive and elegant. More recently, I purchased a comforter set from a major retailer that is being used in another room in the condo. It is coming unsewed, fading and doesn't the quality look of these shams. I'm now ordering a coverlet and more of these shams to replace that set.
customer_reviews.author: MaHoney Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for dressing up the pillows!
customer_reviews.text: These pillow shams are wonderful. Made well and feel great. I was a little worried about color, but I chose burgundy and it IS burgundy. It matches my bed skirt exactly. My bed cover has some burgundy in the design. All match well, looks like I purchased all together. Very happy with these shams, will probably order more for the other bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Color of item misleading
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Sellers description on color is misleading. Photo shows one color but what you actually get is much lighter, almost white. He also sells this item on EBay, and lists it the same way. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Casual and white is nice for more dressy
customer_reviews.text: Great for a Kids, and Dogs Bonus, Play or rec room Sofa /Daybed or Floor Pillow. Easily Washable-thought I would hang to dry, and wash with Like Colors. The white ones are really nice as Navy many times in a room Such as these types picks up more lint. Nice looking , Practical for the need.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Super nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautigul expensive looking sham, good quality, and colors are true. Bought the light gray one and immediately loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Great shams! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to go with another set of shams on our bed. They arrived right away. They’re nice, exactly as described. Nice quality. The reviewers that said the zipper was missing. The description plainly states that there is not zipper. The backside has the usual lit in the back to put your king pillow inside. Very please. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristee

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was lookin for inexpensive but decent pillow shams and I found them! They are perfect for th price, I bought the white ones.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Mejorado

customer_reviews.title: These are okay, but not quite what expected.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike microfiber and these don't seem to be cotton as I expected. The embroidery is not perfect. My expectations may be high because I purchased a product on here years ago, now threadbare, but it is really what I am seeking.
customer_reviews.author: Redhorses

customer_reviews.title: MUSTARD MUST-HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: New burgundy embroidered bedspread has mustard gold floral stitching. Needed some King shams to complete the look. These could not match more perfectly. Great price for a set. Prime shipping as promised.
customer_reviews.author: JARRX4

customer_reviews.title: Almost!
customer_reviews.text: Great shams, but the wrong color for me. I thought they looked more green-gold, online. In person, they’re really a brighter Orange/Camel. Otherwise, they’re great shams, and they fit a super puffy King pillow insert, BEAUTIFULLY! I’ll be purchasing in the white instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillow shams. They are lovely. Recommended A+
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH ARELLANO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shams!
customer_reviews.text: These pillow shams are gorgeous and exactly what I wanted to go in my new Farmhouse bedroom. VERY soft and REALLY white. The design is very attractive, but not overpowering. They don't standup the way it shows in the picture, but I still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy26

customer_reviews.title: Good shams for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These are decent pillow shams and look better than others in the same price range. They are also the same lime green pictured with the description. It's a good match for the cover I was putting them with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: King brown sham
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Saturday & received it Monday. Nice rich brown quilt texture. Pretty and perfect for our king pillows we use just for added decorative purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases this year! Absolutely beautiful! Make my bed look like one at a bed and breakfast. Bought these shams on Deal Day for a steal! Color as stated and look even more beautiful in person! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Elkins

customer_reviews.title: wrong color for what I need.cant use scan label to print return label, no ups store here
customer_reviews.text: second request for mailing label I can print myself to return the items, the code I have only works at the UPS store and we don't have one close by.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice pillow shams and at a great price. Only issue I have is the color. I wanted Aqua, the listing said they were aqua and the look aqua in the photos. They're not. They're light blue and clash horribly with my aqua quilt
customer_reviews.author: Nola Meyers

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. The beige /taupe is a true very light taupe. 100% cotton. Washed and dried perfectly. My puffy king pillows fit perfectly. No loose threads or messed up quilting.
customer_reviews.author: KatRon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Soft and pretty at the same time. Washes up good.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Kopek - Minnick

customer_reviews.title: Great Shams
customer_reviews.text: Love the shams, they are beautiful and look great on our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: We washed them but it was just a waste of time
customer_reviews.text: They shed soooo much we couldn't use them. We washed them but it was just a waste of time. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel A. Moreta Morel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pillow shams.
customer_reviews.text: These went perfect with my very expensive Liz Claiborne bedspread. Great price--great look. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight beautifully detailed shams
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful shams but the fabric is a little thinner than I expected. They look absolutely lovely
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gates

customer_reviews.title: Bright and classic
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with these shams. They fit our king size pillows perfectly and look really nice. We have an antique white embroidered quilt on our bed, and even though the embroidery is different, these shams are simple and classic enough that they compliment it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color leans more in the light blue family and they are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Familee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for such an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Can’t find better quality pillow shams for that value.
customer_reviews.author: chev

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect, at a third of the usual price of othet king shams. Worked well with our colors and nice easy inserting the pillow. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Peg in NC

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, especially for the price. The stitching was all clean and tight. My only complaint is the weight of the back - it's a little light (see through) and hardly closes over the pillow. Just looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Cause-4-Applause

customer_reviews.title: They matched the set of blankets we purchased perfectly. ...
customer_reviews.text: They matched the set of blankets we purchased perfectly. Until we washed them. Then they came out pinkish and dulled down to an ivory.
customer_reviews.author: One More Denise

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is warm rather than cool to the touch
customer_reviews.text: Kind of an aqua blue. Fabric is warm rather than cool to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A.

customer_reviews.title: 2-Piece Embroidered Pillow Shams-King Size
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 5 sets of shams in different colors! They are very well made! Colors are true, wash well. I'mquiet happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Carey

customer_reviews.title: They were on time and fit our bed perfect. our dogs nails have not put any rips ...
customer_reviews.text: They were on time and fit our bed perfect.our dogs nails have not put any rips in them. I would buy them again.Thank you
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Quilted Pillow Shams
customer_reviews.text: Love these quilted pillow shams! Excellent quality for the price! I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrydeg

customer_reviews.title: Color hard to determine
customer_reviews.text: The color was not what I expected. I was looking more sand but it was more pink
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Beeautiful pillow shams. Very well made and look great on my bed. Embroidery detail is well done.
customer_reviews.author: sweet lady

customer_reviews.title: but they are perfect! Well made and very pretty in burgandy
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about these when I bought them, but they are perfect! Well made and very pretty in burgandy. I bought them to put behind the shams for my bedspread. They just set everything off. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Riften

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love them very pretty. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality shams and what a great price! They are twice this much in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Nanr22

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These shams are gorgeous and I am very pleased with them. You can’t beat the value or quality. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Leiane

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These go great with the turquoise and white embroidered quilt I was given by a friend. Looks perfect and complete!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and we'll made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little has them monogrammed in navy blue . Very soft. I've paid much more for sham not this nice. Will order more even for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Anita.J

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price! So nice that I bought another set. These are well-made and are really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful look.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shams. Very well made and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a true white
customer_reviews.text: The stitching is nice but the colour is far from white. On their own, they appear white but alongside my white sheet set, they spear yellowed. They'd be fine if there was no other true white near them. Because of this, I'm quite disappointed and will have to find another solution. It's clear that ordering online isn't going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a twin bed
customer_reviews.text: Great decorative pillows for a twin bed - daughter has then on her dorm bed - work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: cdaley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality; appreciated the size being accurate and the lovely quilting on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marsh A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my summer white quilt and great for my Holiday, red/white theme! Nice and thick and great design!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pillow shams
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect for the bedspread I have on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillow shams! They are beautiful and add just the right amount of color to my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Very true to the description. Just perfect for what I needed and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Not light blue.... almost green
customer_reviews.text: These are almost green, not light blue at all, a horrid color
customer_reviews.author: AKA

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Color is a bit off from what I wanted, but it blends well.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shams are wonderfully produced. Stitching is great, nothing has torn or unraveled. Washes and dries easily. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is just for decoration but it matches my comforter set perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bedspread was too small for my bed. Kept the shams and used for throws on my den couches.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hammett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Color not as pictured. The light beige/taupe/ivory is more of a light camel look. The fabric is thin and shiny.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set and ended up ordering another for a different bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: King Pillow Shams.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pillow shams with nice detail. They are slightly larger than a king pillow but wrapping some batting around the pillow helps plump it up and fills the sham better.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, didn't expect them to be so nice, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kay

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect, had trouble finding a correct fitting one in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect ,had trouble finding a correct fitting one in the box stores .this one was the best deal and fit.thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the shams, they look good and wash nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth J.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these. Excellent quality and very nicely made. I wanted thick, sturdy material and stitching and is exactly what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Walkuski

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful just what I was looking for. Looks great with my blue and while hobnail bedspread. Great product great price great service.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Bernasconi

customer_reviews.title: Nice shams
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and well worth the price. Made very well
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Tum

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for this pair.
customer_reviews.text: These shams appear to be a good deal for the price. There was a stray thread here and there , but that is an easy fix. They fit as expected and arrived when stated.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Houlden

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, excellent quality and value. The quilting effect looks great.
customer_reviews.author: edward_R

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty. Haven't washed it yet but there is ample ...
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty. Haven't washed it yet but there is ample room for the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: these are very nice shams.
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the price fool you, these are very nice shams.
customer_reviews.author: k myers

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted to match quilted bedspread.
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I wanted! The pillow I put in it were somewhat flat & it doesn't look as nice with a flatter pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Just what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Kay B.

customer_reviews.title: ... bedroom with new comforter and these shams are just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Redoing bedroom with new comforter and these shams are just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the shams - very generous size and good quality fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Dapolito

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The description says 2 piece but I only got one pillow sham. What can be dome?
customer_reviews.author: Joyce J Michels

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted these to go with a handmade heirloom quilt. Look great!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIE L. BOWER

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow shams. Very well made. Will definitely order another color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the shams but did not like having to pay to return the extra package.
customer_reviews.text: The shams are perfect and actually more than expected. I was especially surprised that a package contained not one but two shams. As a result I returned the extra package for a refund minus shipping charge. Would suggest that the wording on the description be adjusted to reflect that each package contains a pair of shams.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Limon

customer_reviews.title: Nice shams
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice quality shams! It's been very hard to find white shams that are not thin like pillowcases. These are white but not a bright crisp white, if that's what you're looking for. For the price and quality I'm definitely happy and they will work with my bedding set. I washed them right away and they launder great!
customer_reviews.author: Snowboaters

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are great white quilted shams! I am pretty picky and was a little worried because I saw a review that said they were ivory, but the customer​ pics showed white, so I took a chance. They aren't​ bleach crazy stark white, they are regular milky white, and as you can see from my pics, they go great with my other white bedding, so I am very pleased! They are soft and high quality. The price is amazing for what you get! I have a queen bed and I propped a standard pillow underneath them to make them even higher and fluffy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Dhanashree108

customer_reviews.title: Love quilted shams. Nicely made fit pillows good. And king size is hard to find.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the white to go with my spring and summer quilts that didn’t have shams to match. They look really nice. Looks like they would last. The quilt I originally bought it for is more an off white. They are so nice I kept them to use with another quilt. It’s hard to find king size quilted shams I’m still on the hunt for a match in king size.
customer_reviews.author: Kona girl

customer_reviews.title: Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Very safe and pretty. I don’t see any difference between these and much more expensive ones. I’m very happy with them. I bought the off white, and they seem white, just like the photo. I’m glad I didn’t get the white because those might have been too white.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: So much nicer than what I expected, especially because they were so inexpensive. Just a quick wash on delicate cycle, tumble dry and put them on your king size pillows. I ordered white and these are definitely white. I'm delighted with them.
customer_reviews.author: AnnonCA

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, color isn’t exact as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Exact style I needed for my bed. They look great and are true to size. Color on the other hand is a little more on the orange side than taupe. So that was a little disappointing, but still match my decor so it works.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love these pillow shams. I saw similar ones at Pottery Barn but they were twice the price. So glad i decided to purchase these, the color is dark navy and they wash well.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayA

customer_reviews.title: Light beige is darker than photo.
customer_reviews.text: Light beige color is much darker than the photo. Looks more like khaki. Overall quality is nice and the price was right, so I am keeping, but disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shams! They are truly beautiful. We won’t actually be sleeping on them, so not sure on softness. Didn’t matter to me.
customer_reviews.author: Readsalot

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: These are a beautiful color of orange. They have maintained their color after numerous washings. So soft. I love sleeping on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. So glad I bought them. If you're looking for a simple, white sham, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nana58

customer_reviews.title: Good quality quilted shams
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and quality of fabric. Color is close to white, would have given it 5 stars if color was closer to ivory than white
customer_reviews.author: Big Papa

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty!  Finishes the bed!
customer_reviews.text: Ihave bought several pairs of these in different colors! Lovevthem,made nice and adds to the made bed!
customer_reviews.author: Graciegirl

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've had these 4 months and washed 2 or 3 times they are covered in little fabric pills. Not soft at all not long lasting complete waste of money. Have to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and have ample room for my very large european down feather pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Sloopy

customer_reviews.title: Quality was great, very pretty, soft, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Quality was great, very pretty, soft, well made. Returned for easy refund due to them being too large (my error). Ordered smaller, on the way.
customer_reviews.author: lynne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, excellent. Really. For two shams cant beat it. I don't use my sham pillows to sleep on, they are decorative only, so they work well. As expected, they are not as thick or firm in shape as what you pay triple for, but they definately look great and are what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: I put these behind the matching Pillows and shams on ...
customer_reviews.text: I put these behind the matching Pillows and shams on my bedspread. They help “hold up” the matching shams and give my bed a neat “finished” look.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed and will be returning
customer_reviews.text: These are ivory not white and they have a sheen. I think that they look cheap and weren't at all what I expected. I am very disappointed and will be returning these
customer_reviews.author: Beachlover27

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shams
customer_reviews.text: They really are very nice for the price. Nicely quilted and fit king size pillows very well.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable texture and great fit for king size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these king size shams to match a shabby chic quilt I had on my bed. They are very well made and just lovely. A little flat right out of the mailing package, but once washed and dried they fluffed right up! Comfortable texture and great fit for king size, definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were very nice. But they are not a true white, they are a little "off white"
customer_reviews.author: CML

customer_reviews.title: Gold/mustard Color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gold/mustard color and works well with my color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Tina TA

product_meta.title: All For You 2-Piece Embroidered Pillow Shams-King size-white color (king, white)-(20"X 36"+2" flange)
product_meta.description: Size:King| Color:WhiteOur quilted pillow shams are stitched with classic royal embroideries. To avoid the problem of broken zipper, we removed the zipper from the back and modify it with long and short fabric.The 100% cotton filling not only allow the embroidery even and flat, but make provide you with very comfortable and soft touch. 2 pieces included in 1 plastic bag. Standard size: 20" X 2"+2" flange. Machine Washable. Tumble dry. Do not bleach.
feature_bullets: -100% soft microfiber face with 100% cotton fillings
-2 king size pillow shams included (20"X 36"+2" flange) ( 51CM X 91CM)
- Envelop closure on the back to avoid broken zippers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars349 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
